meanings.definition: A sound made by something wet hitting a surface.
meanings.sent1: The splats of rain on the roof were soothing.
meanings.sent2: I stepped in a puddle and left splats on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The chef's sauce splats on the plate looked like art.
meanings.sent4: The splats of paint on the canvas added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The splats of mud on the window made it hard to see outside.

meanings.definition: A mark or spot made by something wet hitting a surface.
meanings.sent1: The splats on the wall showed where the water had dripped.
meanings.sent2: She wiped away the splats of ketchup from the table.
meanings.sent3: The splats of ink on the paper formed a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The splats of chocolate on the cake made it look delicious.
meanings.sent5: The splats of paint on the floor needed cleaning up.

meanings.definition: To make a wet hitting sound or mark on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The rain splats against the window during the storm.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally splats the sauce on her shirt while cooking.
meanings.sent3: The kids love to splats paint on paper during art class.
meanings.sent4: His heart splats with joy when he sees his family.
meanings.sent5: The basketball splats against the backboard before going in.
